goal.en: In the first half of this course, we will introduce the diagnostic tools for climate dynamics and climate variability research. In the second half, students are required to conduct a small project research.
goal.ch: 本課程前半部介紹氣候動力和氣候變遷研究所需之診斷工具；後半部由老師個別指導同學進行小論文研究。

content.en:

4. Small Project
